title: stompix
author: stompix
content: What happened:ilghan has tried for almost a year to get investors for his mining after that fintech now defi or whatever venture, at every single point lying about numbers, their experience, the license, and the actual project itself.I can understand when a newbie tries to start a business and he has no clue how to do it but at this point heliosfund has just turned into a scam trying to get some money no matter what.User profile:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2933399Archived website:https://archive.ph/LYOpNArchived topic:https://ninjastic.space/topic/5347550First lie:Quote from: ilghan on July 04, 2021, 03:19:32 PMwe are starting a fintech based on mining, fully regulated with a EU license:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xeu564gK2D2HcODvy-5gihYBiFir4CCe/view?usp=drivesdkWhen caught he admitted there was actually no license and as time passes there will be none:Quote from: ilghan on July 05, 2021, 08:09:29 AMwe are in touch with https://alphaumi.com/ in order to submit the application for the license in Estonia.Claimed there will be no ICO or Token sales:Quote from: ilghan on July 12, 2021, 09:31:45 AMwe're not doing any ico, whoever is willing to invest in us because and believes in our business model is gonna have convertible notes/equities in return, as a  normal company /startup .Another lie:Quote from: ilghan on June 02, 2022, 12:15:32 PMGlad to announce the litepaper of our $MiFi token:  ~We are going to run a private token presale of the $MiFi tokenBack to the mining business, when confronted with his own lies in this post,  where basic math showed he was running his miners at least 10 times more efficient than everything on the market he suddenly swifted the whole business from bitcoin mining to altcoin miningQuote from: ilghan on July 28, 2021, 09:54:47 AMwe mainly mine altcoins, not bitcon. that's why we make money.Company experience:Quote from: ilghan on August 12, 2021, 11:46:33 PMDon’t worry about experience , our cto has been living off mining for the last 7 years , from early fpga to ASICS through liquid cooled fpga and enhanced bitstreams,  everything . He’s the cto, highly skilled miner , no mystery of sort : https://twitter.com/luca85ogrumo?s=21Turns out the expert with 7 years of mining was also present on this forum, probably his alt, who was not only doing bounty hunting for every shitcoins but was also having problems keeping 6 video cards cool.More fake claims:On the website, they claimed to have been "seen' on Nasdaq, lies.300% APR claimsStock photos:http://www.heliosfund.io/images/about_us.pnghttps://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/shot-young-man-working-on-computer-1041313726How this is going to work, majik?QuoteWe produce a basket of different cryptocurrencies, in the spirit of diversification. Subsequently, those coins go through the Mi.Fi protocol, where a smart swapping strategy at the best market conditions and a DeFi integration are being applied. The final output will be a larger amount of Bitcoin, which we hold indefinitely.No proof of the former mining equipment, no proof of the claimed datacenter, no proof of a license.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I decided to flag the user since he created several ANNs about his fake mining project. He's been giving excuse after excuse, which means he's lying and should not be trusted with money.Flag - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2990 (support/oppose)

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on June 28, 2022, 11:58:23 AMI decided to flag the user since he created several ANNs about his fake mining project. He's been giving excuse after excuse, which means he's lying and should not be trusted with money.Flag - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=2990 (support/oppose)negative feedback placed and supported flag by my side.of all the scam schemes, cloud or virtual mining is the one I hate the most. I am always disappointed when I see that someone believed in it and invested money.

comments.author: ilghan
comments.body: i'm sorry for you but being the thread public everybody can evaluate the legitimacy of our proposition. In fact, every doubt you had has been well explained, no problems at all from our side.

comments.author: maurice33
comments.body: The incessant rate of Advanced Fee Fraud is alarming, I was almost taken advantage of by those Scoundrels. I invested a lot of Thousands of dollars with the platform only to be disappointed when it was time for withdrawals, They refused to let me take my funds and insisted that I pay some percentage in form of taxes before I withdraw. I was very upset but for fear of losing my initial deposit I had to pay, but these miscreants still refused to let me withdraw. I had to make several complaints to the Agency which referred me to Chargebacknow(at) Aol . com they took up my case and help retrieve my funds

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: maurice33 on July 06, 2022, 12:10:57 PM~Yeah, like moths drawn to fire, here comes another scammer spamming his fake recovery service, hopefully, all the messages will get nuked before he manages to scam some victim.Quote from: ilghan on July 05, 2022, 10:35:22 AMi'm sorry for you but being the thread public everybody can evaluate the legitimacy of our proposition. In fact, every doubt you had has been well explained, no problems at all from our side.  You have zero legitimacy just as you have zero licenses, zero projects, zero assets, and zero plans other than scamming some poor victims who ouwl believe the load of crap on your website that changes every quarter according to the hype you want to attach your "project" too.If you had any legitimacy you would show something from your mining operations that should have been working for years now and at the rates claimed you should afford easily to start your business without begging on go fund me ...But the fact that you just copy-pasted the same message on both threads is a bit reassuring, you're running low on credible excuses.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ilghan on July 05, 2022, 10:35:22 AMi'm sorry for you but being the thread public everybody can evaluate the legitimacy of our proposition. In fact, every doubt you had has been well explained, no problems at all from our side.  Lamentations do not work here. You either prove that your business is legitimate or you go home!Quote from: maurice33 on July 06, 2022, 12:10:57 PMI had to make several complaints to the Agency which referred me to Chargebacknow(at) Aol . com they took up my case and help retrieve my fundsWe are not the kind of people you are going to lie to and scam using your scam recovery "agency"You are wasting your time here.

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.created_time: July 28, 2022, 06:24:32 PMLast edit: July 28, 2022, 07:53:24 PM by arabspaceship123
comments.body: APRIL 10 2022JULY 28 2022Your proposition isn't legitimate. You're begging hasn't stopped. You wanted $250k. It didn't work your pledges were $424. On your next target you want $50k early bird. You're wasting your time you won't make money from scamming bitcointalk people.Helios isn't a business it's scam. You've received pledges of $574 https://wefunder.com/heliosfundQuote from: ilghan on July 05, 2022, 10:35:22 AMi'm sorry for you but being the thread public everybody can evaluate the legitimacy of our proposition. In fact, every doubt you had has been well explained, no problems at all from our side.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: arabspaceship123 on July 28, 2022, 06:24:32 PMHelios isn't a business it's scam. You've received pledges of $574 https://wefunder.com/heliosfundThanks for the link, some interesting info.The scammer team:QuoteEthan Church CTOBlockchain developer , founder of nominalventures.comof course the domain is not working anymore but they have a new one at nominal.ventures, and this is where things get interesting, as they list an Instagram account:https://www.instagram.com/nominalventures/  with 0 posts 3,279 followers 2 followingHow could you get three thousand followers without a single post?The other member of the "team" seems to be "Daniele Uggetti"And look at this guy CV:wrtoken dead, curvehashcoin dead coin bnbsov dead token, and of course he has an account here, that spits project like a broken hotdog machine.And what a surprise, the launcher of curvehashcoin is the exact "mining specialist" I've quoted in the first post, the guy that wasn't able to cool 6 videocards.So their whole team of international experts is probably made of a single guy running multiple accounts and not getting any more with useless token sales decided to try a mining business scam.

comments.author: ilghan
comments.body: everything you said is untrue.The http://www.nominal.ventures site does exist, he just changed domain from .com to .ventures The mining specialist Daniele is a respected farm manager who worked for big installations. It's normal that out of 18k tokens just a few survive, that has nothing to do with the reliability of our team member.We're a bitcoin backed project, therefore our token will be solid enough.The wefunder page we kept it there for the sake of having a one-tap explanatory page ready to be shared.We have big institutional backers, hard work paid off. Big announcements soon

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: They think we'll believe them if they say they're going to be receiving institutional investment. They're lying, there isn't institutional investment they're selling scam tokens.Quote from: stompix on July 28, 2022, 07:07:07 PMQuote from: arabspaceship123 on July 28, 2022, 06:24:32 PMHelios isn't a business it's scam. You've received pledges of $574 https://wefunder.com/heliosfundThanks for the link, some interesting info.The scammer team:QuoteEthan Church CTOBlockchain developer , founder of nominalventures.comof course the domain is not working anymore but they have a new one at nominal.ventures, and this is where things get interesting, as they list an Instagram account:https://www.instagram.com/nominalventures/  with 0 posts 3,279 followers 2 followingHow could you get three thousand followers without a single post?The other member of the "team" seems to be "Daniele Uggetti"And look at this guy CV:wrtoken dead, curvehashcoin dead coin bnbsov dead token, and of course he has an account here, that spits project like a broken hotdog machine.And what a surprise, the launcher of curvehashcoin is the exact "mining specialist" I've quoted in the first post, the guy that wasn't able to cool 6 videocards.So their whole team of international experts is probably made of a single guy running multiple accounts and not getting any more with useless token sales decided to try a mining business scam.
